title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Digital Environment-Based English Communication and Literacy Skills

context.prior_knowledge: English reading comprehension and basic digital tool utilization skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners create a 3-minute English video presentation to demonstrate topic delivery skills and digital literacy
Learners enhance collaborative content creation skills through video editing tools and multimedia integration

Learners submit improvement plans at least once every four weeks based on formative assessment feedback (knowledge/skills/attitude categories) provided biweekly, document execution results in a portfolio, and demonstrate self-directed learning competencies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
